data.comment: Mechelen kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
An attacking Mechelen player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 7, Mechelen have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 8, An attacking Mechelen player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Nemanja Antonov (Mouscron) gets a yellow card.
Herve Koffi is booked for the home team.
Goal! Nikola Storm gives Mechelen the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 0-1.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The second half is underway in Mouscron - Mouscron with the kick-off.
Joachim Van Damme for Mechelen has been booked by Christof Dierick and receives a first yellow card.
Marko Bakic (Mouscron) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 48, Rocky Bushiri (Mechelen) has received a first yellow card.
The away team replace Aster Vranckx with Igor De Camargo.
Enes Saglik is replacing Beni Badibanga for the home team.
In the minute 78, Serge Tabekou is on a sub for Imad Faraj for Mouscron.
Mechelen make their second substitution with Onur Kaya replacing Nikola Storm.
Wouter Vrancken (Mechelen) is making a third substitution, with Jordi Vanlerberghe replacing William Togui.
In the minute 84, Fernando Da Cruz is making the team's third substitution at Stade Le Canonnier with Cedric Omoigui replacing Virgiliu Postolachi.
At Stade Le Canonnier, Gaetan Coucke has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The match has come to a close in Mouscron. The final score is 0-1.
